org.interstellarocean.terraforming.reflection

Interface ReflectionModelTransformerProvider


  • public interface ReflectionModelTransformerProvider
    Provides builder allowing creation and configuration of ReflectionModelTransformer instances in a library-independent way. The provider implementation should isolate the library allowing easy change of used library in ModelTransformer implementations.

    Note that ReflectionModelTransformer instances built by the provider implementation must be thread-safe.

    Suitable to implement the strategy pattern and for use with factory.

    Example

     public class FooModelTransformerProvider implements ReflectionModelTransformerProvider {

        private final FooFactory fooFactory;

        @Inject // @Autowired, etc.
        public FooModelTransformerProvider(FooFactory fooFactory) {
                this.fooFactory = fooFactory;
        }

        @Override
        public boolean provides(Class<?> library) {
                return org.bar.Foo.class.equals(library);
        }

        @Override
        public <SOURCE, DESTINATION> ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder<SOURCE, DESTINATION> builder() {
                return sourceType -> destinationType -> excludeFieldNames -> () -> {

                        FooConfigurator<SOURCE, DESTINATION> fooConfigurator = fooFactory.classTransformerConfigurator(sourceType, destinationType);
                        excludeFieldNames.forEach(fieldName -> fooConfigurator.exclude(fieldName));
                        fooConfigurator.register();

                        TransformerFacade<SOURCE, DESTINATION> reflectionModelTransformer = fooFactory.getTransformerFacade(sourceType, destinationType);
                        return source -> destination -> {
                                reflectionModelTransformer.transform(source, destination);
                                return destination;
                        };

                };
        }

 }
    Author:
    Dariusz Wakuli≈Ñski
    See Also:
    org.interstellarocean.terraforming.reflection, ReflectionModelTransformer, ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <SOURCE,DESTINATION>
      ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder<SOURCE,DESTINATION>      		 builder()
      Creates ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder allowing creation and configuration of a ReflectionModelTransformer instance that uses provided library.
      boolean provides(Class<?> library)
      Tests if the library class is supported by the provider.

    • Method Detail

      • provides

        boolean provides(Class<?> library)
        Tests if the library class is supported by the provider. Allows selecting requested strategy by ReflectionModelTransformerFactory.
        Parameters:
        library - A class marking the implementation of a strategy that use specific reflection transforming library. Suitable for use by factory to select requested strategy. Actually may be any type (class, interface, etc.), but recommended is a type from the implemented library. Should be unique across implementations (strategies).
        Returns:
        True if the provider supports the library class.

      • builder

        <SOURCE,DESTINATION> ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder<SOURCE,DESTINATION> builder()
        Creates ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder allowing creation and configuration of a ReflectionModelTransformer instance that uses provided library.
        Type Parameters:
        SOURCE - Type to transform from. Used to parameterize ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder.
        DESTINATION - Type to transform to. Used to parameterize ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder.
        Returns:
        ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder allowing creation and configuration of a ReflectionModelTransformer instance that uses provided library.
        See Also:
        ReflectionModelTransformerBuilder
